column2: mutate(ID = ID, Details = Details, Gene_name = str_extract(Gene, "^.*?(?=_)"), .before = "Gene") %>% # Add ID and Details info. Also Create a new column witht eh gene name that does not contain the primer ending
mutate(Gene_name = ifelse(!is.na(Gene_name), Gene_name, Gene)) # Create column containing onlz gene name by merging Gene with Gene_name if Gene_name contains "NA" values
